detaileddescription.para: spec_version: "0.2.0" title: Approve Proposed Transaction summary: '{{nowrap level.actor}} approves the {{nowrap proposal_name}} proposal'

sect2.title: icon: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AntelopeIO/reference-contracts/main/contracts/icons/multisig.png#4fb41d3cf02d0dd2d35a29308e93c2d826ec770d6bb520db668f530764be7153
sect2.para: {{level.actor}} approves the {{proposal_name}} proposal proposed by {{proposer}} with the {{level.permission}} permission of {{level.actor}}.
spec_version: "0.2.0" title: Cancel Proposed Transaction summary: '{{nowrap canceler}} cancels the {{nowrap proposal_name}} proposal'

sect2.title: icon: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AntelopeIO/reference-contracts/main/contracts/icons/multisig.png#4fb41d3cf02d0dd2d35a29308e93c2d826ec770d6bb520db668f530764be7153
sect2.para: spec_version: "0.2.0" title: Execute Proposed Transaction summary: '{{nowrap executer}} executes the {{nowrap proposal_name}} proposal'

sect2.title: icon: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AntelopeIO/reference-contracts/main/contracts/icons/multisig.png#4fb41d3cf02d0dd2d35a29308e93c2d826ec770d6bb520db668f530764be7153
sect2.para: {{executer}} executes the {{proposal_name}} proposal submitted by {{proposer}} if the minimum required approvals for the proposal have been secured.
spec_version: "0.2.0" title: Invalidate All Approvals summary: '{{nowrap account}} invalidates approvals on outstanding proposals'

sect2.title: icon: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AntelopeIO/reference-contracts/main/contracts/icons/multisig.png#4fb41d3cf02d0dd2d35a29308e93c2d826ec770d6bb520db668f530764be7153
sect2.para: {{account}} invalidates all approvals on proposals which have not yet executed.
spec_version: "0.2.0" title: Propose Transaction summary: '{{nowrap proposer}} creates the {{nowrap proposal_name}}'

sect2.title: icon: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AntelopeIO/reference-contracts/main/contracts/icons/multisig.png#4fb41d3cf02d0dd2d35a29308e93c2d826ec770d6bb520db668f530764be7153
sect2.para: {{proposer}} creates the {{proposal_name}} proposal for the following transaction: {{to_json trx}}

The proposal requests approvals from the following accounts at the specified permission levels: {{#each requested}}
{{this.permission}} permission of {{this.actor}} {{/each}}
If the proposed transaction is not executed prior to {{trx.expiration}}, the proposal will automatically expire.
spec_version: "0.2.0" title: Unapprove Proposed Transaction summary: '{{nowrap level.actor}} revokes the approval previously provided to {{nowrap proposal_name}} proposal'

sect2.title: icon: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AntelopeIO/reference-contracts/main/contracts/icons/multisig.png#4fb41d3cf02d0dd2d35a29308e93c2d826ec770d6bb520db668f530764be7153
sect2.para: {{level.actor}} revokes the approval previously provided at their {{level.permission}} permission level from the {{proposal_name}} proposal proposed by {{proposer}}.
